title: BloodRavor Cleaver Vi?

replies.body:
She doesn't really need attack speed because of her AA reset on her E and she already has an armor shred passive. Plus with so little AD you'll only be doing damage through your W passive, and you probably won't get to AA that much in teamfights. 

If you really want to meme you could go rageblade and solo baron though because you'll be applying your W passive every other hit instead of on every 3rd hit. But yeah neither of them are serious builds.
Well, not viable then I guess. Thanks for the meme advice. Might try it.
My opinion is that while a bloodrazor punchy build has potential, you'd need to get a little more AD.  Preferably a second AD item.
